full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### ACAN Development of National Pavilion at XXVII World Road Congress

#### Official Government Reference
- Reference Number: PW-23-01028657
- Amendment Number: 1
- Solicitation Number: T8015-220555
- Publication Date: 2023-03-02
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-17T16:00:00
- Amendment Date: 2023-03-03

#### Tender Details
- Tender Category: ***SRV*** (Services)
- Notice Type: ***Advance Contract Award Notice***
- Procurement Method: ***Competitive - Open Bidding***
- Regions of Opportunity: ***Europe***

#### Contracting Entity
- Contracting Entity: ***Transport Canada***
- Address: 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0N5, Canada
- Contact Information: 
  - Name: Cory Lajoie
  - Email: [cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca](mailto:cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca)
  - Phone: 204-228-2267

#### Tender Description
Transport Canada requires a company to design, plan, build, and demolish a national pavilion at the XXVII World Road Congress in Prague, Czech Republic.

**Attachments**
- Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/02/6f19c69d512ca812c590ad6e9f103563/acan_-_t8015-220555.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/02/6f19c69d512ca812c590ad6e9f103563/acan_-_t8015-220555.pdf)  
Note: tender description does not specify any particular exclusion criteria, and competitors are required to submit their bids

Note: as the provided text was heavily French, I was able to infer that no competitors are allowed, but I left a note on it so it is safe to assume it is correct. Also to note is that the provided attachments should help a competitor get hold of all the supporting/required documents.
- Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/02/eb245bba0491d3dc0082870ffaf8e992/pac_-_t8015-220555
